segments.text: I notice the boy is really determined to get those cookies, no matter what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so much that the stool looks like it's about to tip over, and that's really dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, looking so hopeful and excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed any of this yet, it's like she's in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, and she's standing right there, drying that plate like nothing else is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's kind of funny how focused she is on that plate, like it's the most important thing in the world right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and peaceful, it's almost ironic compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get away with taking those cookies, or if the woman will catch them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks like he's about to lose his balance any second now, and that could be really bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening behind her, before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so chaotic, but the woman seems completely unaware of it all, and that's really concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR
